mapper.insert: INSERT INTO argon.USERS (USERNAME, PASSWORD, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email} )
mapper.sql: SELECT U.ID AS USER_ID, U.USERNAME AS USER_USERNAME, U.PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD, U.FIRST_NAME AS USER_FIRST_NAME, U.LAST_NAME AS USER_LAST_NAME, U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, G.ID AS GROUP_ID, G.NAME AS GROUP_NAME, G.ROLE AS GROUP_ROLE, G.MODIFIED_AT AS GROUP_MODIFIED_AT, G.CREATED_AT AS GROUP_CREATED_AT, U.LAST_LOGIN AS USER_LAST_LOGIN, U.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_MODIFIED_AT, U.CREATED_AT AS USER_CREATED_AT, UP.ID AS USER_PREFERENCE_ID, UP.NAME AS USER_PREFERENCE_NAME, UP.VALUE AS USER_PREFERENCE_VALUE, UP.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_PREFERENCE_MODIFIED_AT, UP.CREATED_AT AS USER_PREFERENCE_CREATED_AT FROM argon.USERS U LEFT JOIN argon.USER_GROUPS UG ON U.ID = UG.USER_ID LEFT JOIN argon.GROUPS G ON UG.GROUP_ID = G.ID LEFT JOIN argon.USER_PREFERENCES UP ON UP.USER_ID = U.ID
mapper.select:
SELECT U.ID AS USER_ID, U.USERNAME AS USER_USERNAME, U.PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD, U.FIRST_NAME AS USER_FIRST_NAME, U.LAST_NAME AS USER_LAST_NAME, U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, U.LAST_LOGIN AS USER_LAST_LOGIN, U.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_MODIFIED_AT, U.CREATED_AT AS USER_CREATED_AT FROM argon.USERS U
AND U.ID = #{id}
AND LOWER(U.USERNAME) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(#{username}, '%'))
AND LOWER(U.EMAIL) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(#{email}, '%'))
AND LOWER(CONCAT(U.FIRST_NAME, ' ', U.LAST_NAME)) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{firstLastName}, '%'))
AND U.CREATED_AT::date = #{date}::date
AND U.CREATED_AT::date >= #{fromDate}::date
AND U.CREATED_AT::date <= #{toDate}::date
ORDER BY CASE WHEN U.PASSWORD IS NULL OR U.PASSWORD = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END DESC, U.USERNAME LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
